short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this counter,computer enginers can leave the computer in 50 min parts. It will prevent the harms of continuous work on health.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An application that prevents people working at the computer from staying at the computer for hours.

This application warns the user in 50-minute periods.
